availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward B. Ayars (2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment)

body.p: Regimental commissary sergeant of the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from March 4, 1863, to December 29, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 46-47.
Find A Grave, "Edward B. Ayars (1848-1908)," Memorial #14055932, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/14055932 (accessed November 9, 2018).
